project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the interaction with the user will occur through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add a contact to the contact book
Implement the feature to search for a contact in the contact book
Implement the feature to update an existing contact
Implement the feature to delete a contact from the contact book
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
